title: The moment Xpecial entered HotshotGG's life

embed.description: Information on this champion can be found here: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Evelynn Gameplay was recorded manually from the CLG livestream found at http://clgaming.net/livestream.php Do not ask me about the runes and masteries used in the video.

body:
I haven't posted here in a while. I wanted to share what I was up to. I'm watching my favourite LoL video. There are memories associated with this video so I don't expect it to also be your favourite. I was an Evelynn main back then. I mean I only played Evelynn. And I loved watching Hotshot's stream. So when you combine the two, you get my favourite LoL video.

I quit the game once I learned the stress of competition is impossible to avoid. Working with people rather than against people is more enjoyable. Working on a team against an other team isn't the same.
